text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist at first. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist at first. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few rain patches. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
